Class ValidCards

java.lang.Object
  ValidCards

public class ValidCards
extends java.lang.Object

This is the class ValidCards of the Assignment 1 project. It holds the possible values for Description and Suits and also the default assignments and the values for each Card.

Version:
5/17/2014
Author:
Voicu Chirtes
